snippet: YOUNG--Henry A. F. of Port Washington, NY passed away a year ago today. In loving memory of our husband, father & friend whose knowledge and wit enriched our lives. He is deeply missed. 1/3
lead_paragraph: YOUNG--Henry A. F. of Port Washington, NY passed away a year ago today. In loving memory of our husband, father & friend whose knowledge and wit enriched our lives. He is deeply missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  YOUNG, HENRY A
